ProjectTitle: "PAR-2, a maternal sensor to detect embryonic signals"
InitialFeedbackHistory:
19/04/2024
Storage: you describe security of solutions that you don't mention under where will data be stored, please make sure these answers are consistent; please  add how/where you will store, and in the next question preserve, your physical data. 
Preservation: Will you preserve and share all your data via RDR, or will part stay on the large volume storage as your answer under costs suggests? 
Sharing: Which datasets will you share openly, which upon request, what is the reason to restrict access if there are no factors restricting sharing? Which license will you select for open data? There are also many repositories in life sciences that may be interesting for your data, for example: https://www.ebi.ac.uk/submission/; for more information see: https://www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/guidance/data-sharing
